about.title: About
about.description: Expert front-end developer with experience in ReactJS, NextJS, and React Native. Experience in web and mobile projects. Skilled in designing with Figma and translating designs into high-quality code. Adept at monitoring, improving, and maintaining frontend performance. Familiar with agile methodologies such as Scrum and version control tools like Git, GitHub, and GitLab.

jobs.title: MID-LEVEL FRONT END DEVELOPER
jobs.description: Creation of web applications and apps using technologies: ReactJS, NextJS, React Native, Typescript, Scrum, Figma, Git, Gitlab, and Github. Responsible for creation, management, maintenance, new features, version management, publication in stores, and user support.

projects.title: SEI PIAUI
projects.description: A React Native application for managing electronic archival processes and documents. One of its main features is knowledge sharing with real-time updates and communication of new events. SEI is a tool that allows the production, editing, signing, and processing of documents within the system itself, enabling the virtualization of processes and documents, allowing simultaneous action of multiple units at the same time in the same process, even if physically distant, reducing the time to complete activities.
projects.responsibilities: Development of new features, maintenance and bug fixing, API integration, publishing versions on Play Store and App Store.

projects.title: Digital Transit
projects.description: Digital Transit is an essential app for traffic agents to simplify accident recording. Capture details, scene photos, use maps for location accuracy. With automatic reports and cloud backup, Digital Transit transforms the process, promoting a digital and effective approach to ensure road safety. Speed, precision, and ease in the palm of your hand.
projects.responsibilities: Project manager, creation and development of new features, maintenance and bug fixing, user support, API integration, publishing versions on Play Store and App Store.

projects.title: SESAPI Dashboard
projects.description: The SESAPI Dashboard is a web application that aims to provide information about the status of health processes in the state of Piauí. The application consists of searching for a protocol and obtaining information about the flow that occurs between units in real-time.
projects.responsibilities: Creation and development of new features, maintenance, API integration, publishing web versions.

projects.title: SEAD Dashboard
projects.description: The SEAD Dashboard is a web application that aims to provide information about the status of administrative processes of all agencies in the state of Piauí. The application features authentication with gov.br, informatives, parameterized indicators, easy-to-visualize tables and graphs, documents, visualization and download of documents in PDF | HTML | Images.
projects.responsibilities: Creation and development of new features, maintenance, API integration, publishing web versions.

projects.title: Education
projects.description: Education is a school management tool where it is possible to manage enrollments, classes, subjects, teachers, students, grades, attendance, class diaries, report cards, transcripts, reports, among others.
projects.responsibilities: Creation and development of new features, maintenance, API integration, publishing web versions.

jobs.title: FRONT END DEVELOPER
jobs.description: As a freelancer, I work as a Front-End developer using technologies: HTML, CSS, SASS, SCSS, JavaScript, Typescript, ReactJS, React Native focusing on creating: Apps, Landing Pages, Websites, Mobile and Web Design.

jobs.title: FRONT-END DEVELOPER - INTERNSHIP
jobs.company: Regional Electoral Court of Piauí, Teresina, Piauí
jobs.description: Development of Web Applications, Maintenance and Implementations of Internal Projects using technologies: HTML, SCSS, Angular 15+, ReactJS, React Native, TypeScript, Javascript and Git | Gitlab as versioning tools.

projects.title: RACE - Ranking of Electoral Offices
projects.description: RACE is a web application that aims to provide information about the situation of electoral offices in the state of Piauí. The application consists of registering evaluations, indicators and parameters for each electoral office in Piauí and generating a ranking according to established criteria.
projects.responsibilities: Development of new features, maintenance and bug fixing, API integration, publishing web versions.

degrees.title: Associate's Degree, Systems Analysis and Development
Bachelor's Degree, Computer Science
degrees.institution: Federal Institute of Piauí - South Zone
